thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 25 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Artefact FY Gross Margin up at 47.1 Million Euros

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Artefact FY Gross Margin up at 47.1 Million Euros
text:
April 25 (Reuters) - ARTEFACT SA:
* FY GROSS MARGIN EUR 47.1‍​ MILLION VERSUS EUR 40.7 MILLION YEAR AGO
* FY EBITDA EUR ‍​1.1 MILLION VERSUS EUR 5.0 MILLION YEAR AGO
* Q1 PRO FORMA GROSS MARGIN EUR ‍​15.0 MILLION VERSUS EUR 13.1 MILLION YEAR AGO
* FY REVENUE EUR 160.9 MILLION VERSUS EUR 140.0 MILLION YEAR AGO
* “CERTAIN THAT 2018 WILL MARK FIRST STAGE IN TURNAROUND IN OUR ACTIVITY AND IN IMPROVEMENT IN OUR RESULTS.” - CEO
* GOALS FOR FY: PRO FORMA GROWTH OF OVER 10%; SIGNIFICANTLY IMPROVED EARNINGS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
